segments.text: The kitchen drawing captures a typical family moment gone wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the sink overflowing with water pouring out steadily.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult is drying dishes, completely unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is in the water, but she doesn't flinch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: On the counter, stacks of clean dishes wait.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool is about to grab from the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool is leaning back dangerously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He holds a plate in one hand, cookies in the other.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl reaches toward him, so eager for a treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their mischief is endearing, but so risky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water damage will be bad if no one stops it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window frames a serene garden scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could warn them about the hazards.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could end in tears for everyone.
segments.speaker: PAR
